about_the_game:
Welcome to Broken Shores, a serene beach cleanup simulation where you become the island's environmental hero. After a devastating cyclone ravaged this once-pristine paradise, the island is now a patchwork of debris and desolation. Your mission is to restore the island's natural beauty, one piece of trash at a time.

Features:

Explore and Clean: Wander along sunlit shores and lush trails as you discover hidden pockets of debris. From sparkling seashells to tangled piles of plastic, your task is to meticulously clean up the remnants of the cyclone’s wrath.

Transform Trash into Treasure: Collect various types of trash and use them to repair and refurbish the island’s decaying structures. Rebuild shelters, revitalize gardens, and rejuvenate coastal habitats to breathe life back into the island.

Relaxing Gameplay: Enjoy a tranquil experience with no time limits or pressure. Take your time to appreciate the calming sounds of the waves and the gentle breeze as you work to restore the island.

Beautiful Environments: Immerse yourself in stunning, hand-crafted environments. From the sun-drenched beaches to the verdant rainforests, every corner of the island is designed to provide a visually pleasing and relaxing escape.

Eco-Friendly Impact: Learn about the impact of pollution on natural habitats and discover eco-friendly tips as you play. Broken Shores promotes environmental awareness in a fun and engaging way.

Join the quest to heal Broken Shores and turn it back into the island paradise it once was. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just looking for a peaceful escape, this game offers a soothing and rewarding journey to restore nature’s beauty, one clean-up at a time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Dive into a peaceful beach cleanup adventure. A cyclone has left the island in disarray, and it’s up to you to restore its beauty. Explore serene shores and verdant trails, collecting debris to clean up. Enjoy relaxing gameplay, while you work to heal Broken Shores.
